title: Victoria Liaonenka – Semrush profileAuthor Photo
description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: How to Hire a Marketing Agency for Your Business (4 Steps)Are you struggling to focus on your business AND do all of the marketing yourself? That’s where hiring a marketing agency can truly pay off. Dive into our quick 4-step guide to get started.General MarketingJan 12, 2022A Quick Start Guide to Client ManagementFor agencies, it’s crucial not only to land new clients but also to retain existing ones. In this guide, you will find an introduction to the client management concept along with best practices for improving your customer relationships.General MarketingJul 29, 2021Top 50 Marketing KPIs for Businesses and AgenciesWe‘ve put together this comprehensive list of the top 50 marketing KPIs for agencies and businesses to track in 2021. Make sure you‘re using the best and most relevant marketing metrics to accomplish greater results.General MarketingMay 17, 2021Project Management Software for Agencies: What to Look forDiscover the main features your agency‘s project management software should have, including resource management, centralized client data, and more, and choose the tool for your agency that suits your individual needs.General MarketingMar 26, 2021
